tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I wanted to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional care and support I received during my pregnancy. Your attentiveness, understanding, and compassion made a world of difference in my experience. Every appointment was a reassuring and informative step in my journey, and your genuine concern for my well-being was evident at every turn. Thank you for making this special time in my life as comfortable and positive as possible. Your dedication and professionalism truly exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend her consultation for any pregnancy related query

Doctor is really helpful but staff is not good. I call their staff to get the reports if they can send me on WhatsApp. They said yes. I have waited for more than 1 hours for their reply. Call the three times still no response.
God knows if you do some operations there then for claim process what you have to gone through.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We our so grateful n would like share our gratitude to Dr Divyashree Mam'a n Dr Rashmi Mam'a  who made our dream come true n showed us new world of parenthood.... whn had left all our thoughts n given up on having a child.  We meet Dr Divyashree Mam'a, who was so confident n started d treatment n was helpful throughout the IVF journey n 2nd phase was pregnancy it was carefully handled by Dr Rashmi Mam'a.. we are now blessed with our baby boy..thanks is a small word who gave us new life n hope.. 2 Dr's who played vital role in our journey of 2+yrs to have a baby...at last not to forget Genea staff.. Always felt liveliness n positive n every visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: The hospital was very nice. We had an appointment booked with Dr Rashmi through Practo. The wait time is usually high, if you just walk in. However, if you book an appointment then the good thing is that they honor it and try to cut the wait time. The doctor was very nice* ************* and understanding. She was super thorough with examination, explained everything in detail and spent good time answering all the questions that we had. She made sure that we were were satisfied and answered every single question that we had.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After 7th year of our marriage my wife got conceived naturally. This all happened because of the treatment of Dr.Rashmi TN. Last year when we visited her that time only my wife got conceived, but unfortunately it got aborted coz of some reason. Again by the  treatment of Dr. Rashmi we got positive result. She is very friendly and have lot of patience to listen us. We will be very great full to her forever. Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Rashmi ma'am is very friendly , kind hearted and enthusiastic . 
Ma'am , will clarify all the doubts of patients in a polite manner.
Ma'am ,explains about medication , precautions ,does and don'ts to the patients very clearly .
Above all ma'am is very optimistic .....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a very friendly and motivated person, and when we were losing hope, she made us very strong with her sportsmanlike words. We haven’t seen anyone like her in our life, which means being a doctor, the way she took care of my wife is the ultimate. Because of her, we are so happy today with a full family frame. She also helped a lot with appointment-related issues. As per our convenience, she accepted the appointment. We will remember her in our lifetime. She should have everything that God has to offer her, and her family should be happy during her lifetime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor is **** *** friendly. She listen carefully and  answers all the questions.

Staff of the hospital is worstt. I have never seen such a lazy, care-less, unresponsive staff. **** ***** ***** ******** ***** *** **** * ******* ** **** * ******** *** they don't bother about patient concern. We need to wait about 2hr approx everytime even though we have booked an appointment. They gives the excuses that there is some urgent surgery etc for being late, rather they should inform patient about delay so that patient can plan their travel to hospital accordingly. Few time i came back without doctor consultation because doctor was busy and urgent surgery and staff didn't inform the patient. Staff don't listen to patient properly and they try to ignore if someone raise a concern about late timings. There is no point of having many people in staff if they are not working with responsibilty. 
At the end , staff is ruining the patient experience with hospital.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Never expected such type of response from a doctor. Not satisfied with the response received. Not satisfied with the treatment. Need refund of my consultation fee

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellent. Couldn’t have asked for a better doctor. She not only is an amazing gynaecologist who is practical and patient but also a strong personality which encouraged me to be strong during my treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It has been great experience to us because the doctors and the staff are kind and gentle.awesome, Its a good center to those who do not have kids after so many  years of marriage. Genea is a holy place for those who are searching for an fertility expert. Dr.Divyashree and Dr.Rashmi are the two doctors ,take care of the patients with love and affection. Please do visit and know the fact. I am the one example have got a cute baby after a decade after marriage..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
no second thought... wealth of experience and the friendliness of the dr. made our wait of long labor pain to an amazing happiness after delivering normally.

I must apricate her Patience that we went thru specifically during a labor time. as well pre check ups and making patient aware of details is highly valuable... makes us confidence.

very trustworthy advice and i highly recommend Dr Rashmi...

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: the doctor postponed the appointment by 2 hours firstly and then made me wait 25 mins more. on top of it she asked terribly inappropriate questions. it was highly disturbing.
reply_text: When ever there is vaginal infection ,it's my duty to ask you where you are sexually active or not. Since the treatment is different and also the mode of use tablets also differs if you are sexually active or not.  When there a complaint of vaginal infection, I have As this question

review: I couldn't meet the doctor. I was waiting for 2 hours. And, couldn't see the doctor. Had to leave without seeing the doctor. And, the clinic didn't even bother to contact me. This is the most unpleasant experience I've ever faced!!
